Texts.Eng:
Stoic, calm and mysterious, the Elduukhar prefer to take the role of artisans or philosophers. They seek discovery and enlightenment.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Can eat almost anything

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Max Health x^green;1.05^reset;, Fall Damage x^green;0.75^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;15^reset;% Fire & Ice, +^cyan;5^reset;% Physical,+^cyan;4^reset;% Shadow
  ^cyan;When at 50% Health, emit slowing ice clouds.^reset;
  Tech: ^green;Crystal Breath^reset;, ^green;Elduukhar Flight^reset;

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Aether Sea, Crystal, Chromatic, Red Desert^reset; biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage.
  ^green;Hot^reset; biomes: Defense x^green;1.15^reset; and Health x^red;0.75^reset;.
  ^red;Cold^reset; biomes: Defense x^red;0.85^reset; and Health x^green;1.25^reset;.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Crystal / Lunari: +^green;12^reset;% Max Health & Defense

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;High Metabolism^reset;: +^red;15^reset;% hunger rate
  ^red;High Food Cost^reset; for Crystal Breath attack and Flight.
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Poison, -^red;10^reset;% Electric
